com.sun.speech.engine.recognition
Class BaseRecognizer

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.speech.engine.BaseEngine
      com.sun.speech.engine.recognition.BaseRecognizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpeechEventDispatcher, Engine, Recognizer
Direct Known Subclasses:
SphinxRecognizer
public class BaseRecognizer
extends BaseEngine
implements Recognizer, SpeechEventDispatcher

Skeletal Implementation of the JSAPI Recognizer interface.

This class is useful by itself for debugging, e.g. you can load grammars and simulate a recognizer recognizing some text, etc.

Actual JSAPI recognizer implementations might want to extend or modify this implementation.

Also contains utility routines for:

  • Loading imported grammars and resolving inter-grammar references.
  • Printing/dumping grammars in an extensible way (used to dump grammar to under-lying recognizer implementation via ASCII strings)
  • Routines for copying grammars from one recognizer implementation to another.

Author:
Stuart Adams

Utility function to generate AUDIO_RELEASED event and post it to the event queue. Eventually fireAudioReleased will be called by dispatchSpeechEvent as a result of this action.

dispatchSpeechEvent

public void dispatchSpeechEvent(SpeechEvent event)
Dispatch a SpeechEvent. This is a method from SpeechEventDispatcher. The dispatcher should notify all listeners of the speech event from this method.

Overrides:
